item.title: Homework 1
item.description: Computing the zonally averaged shortwave / longwave radiation for January and July You can find the instruction of the homework and the example from the following link: https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1ixTv-Ov1xVFpM1q0aDjO_FyhLDB6i7gd If you click the link, you may be asked to log in. Then log in Google Colaboratory with your Yonsei email. If you are comfortable with other programming languages, please feel free to use them. The data file for Matlab can be obtained from:
